dynamic-hibernate.query: SELECT queue_Nm, traceStorage_Id FROM CSL_QUEUE_TRACE_STORAGE WHERE 1=1 #if($queue_Nm) AND queue_Nm = :queue_Nm #end #if($traceStorage_Id) AND traceStorage_Id = :traceStorage_Id #end ORDER BY traceStorage_Id DESC

SELECT qts.queue_Nm, ts.traceStorage_Id, ts.name, ts.ip, ts.port, ts.system_Status, ts.manual_Status FROM CSL_TRACE_STORAGE ts, CSL_QUEUE_TRACE_STORAGE qts WHERE 1=1 #if($queue_Nm) AND qts.queue_Nm = :queue_Nm #end #if($name) AND ts.name LIKE :name #end #if($ip) AND ts.ip LIKE :ip #end #if($port) AND ts.port = :port #end #if($system_Status) AND ts.system_Status = :system_Status #end #if($manual_Status) AND ts.manual_Status = :manual_Status #end AND ts.traceStorage_Id = qts.traceStorage_Id ORDER BY ts.traceStorage_Id DESC

SELECT ts.traceStorage_Id, ts.name, ts.ip, ts.port, ts.system_Status, ts.manual_Status FROM CSL_TRACE_STORAGE ts WHERE 1=1 #if($name) AND ts.name LIKE :name #end #if($ip) AND ts.ip LIKE :ip #end #if($port) AND ts.port = :port #end #if($system_Status) AND ts.system_Status = :system_Status #end #if($manual_Status) AND ts.manual_Status = :manual_Status #end AND ts.traceStorage_Id NOT IN (SELECT traceStorage_Id FROM CSL_QUEUE_TRACE_STORAGE WHERE queue_Nm = :queue_Nm) ORDER BY ts.traceStorage_Id DESC

SELECT q.queue_Nm, q.manual_Status, q.is_Repeat, q.expire_Time, qts.traceStorage_Id FROM CSL_QUEUE q, CSL_QUEUE_TRACE_STORAGE qts WHERE 1=1 #if($traceStorage_Id) AND qts.traceStorage_Id = :traceStorage_Id #end #if($queue_Nm) AND q.queue_Nm = :queue_Nm #end #if($manual_Status) AND q.manual_Status = :manual_Status #end AND q.queue_Nm = qts.queue_Nm

SELECT ts.traceStorage_Id, ts.name, ts.ip, ts.port, ts.system_Status, ts.manual_Status, qts.queue_Nm FROM CSL_TRACE_STORAGE ts, CSL_QUEUE_TRACE_STORAGE qts WHERE 1=1 #if($queue_Nm) AND qts.queue_Nm = :queue_Nm #end #if($system_Status) AND ts.system_Status = :system_Status #end #if($manual_Status) AND ts.manual_Status = :manual_Status #end AND ts.traceStorage_Id = qts.traceStorage_Id
